imageupdate
Class ImageRestoreThread

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--imageupdate.ImageRestoreThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ImageRestoreThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This thread class is used by the ImageUpdateThread to ask the server to prepare and restore a new image while the client is computing the last one

Version:
1.0
Author:
Bjorn Husberg and Louise Tysk

Field Summary
private  Client client
          The client that holds settings information
private  boolean done
          The done-variable is used to tell the ImageUpdateThread that we are finished
private  java.lang.Object lock
          The lock that is shared with the ImageUpdateThread object
private  RMIServerInterface server
          A reference to the server
private  ImageUpdateThread updater
          The ImageUpdateThread that owns this object
